infos.value: On a chocobo, you can explore all over the world and find valuable items to bring back with you.
Let us promptly depart.
It typically takes a reasonable amount of time to acquire sufficient experience and an abundance of goods, but there is a special method to consider when you are unable to wait.
If you use an Expedition Ticket...
Welcome back, Lord Mont. Now, let us recover the goods you have found.
...Oh, it appears that you have obtained some magicite. This is used to train espers.
Why don't we make the most of this occasion and use it to train an esper?
You have acquired some SP after your esper leveled up. Let us use this SP to awaken a new ability within the esper.
Among the many abilities that can be acquired, some appear to be used for leveling up the esper's evocation magic.
You can also reset the panels you've acquired on the Training Board and reacquire them.
You may encounter situations where it would be beneficial to swap out certain panels according to your party formation or the enemies you expect to fight.
• Chocobo Expedition •
Select which <color=#00ffff>units</color> to send out and the <color=#00ffff>expedition area</color> they'll explore and <color=#00ffff>head out</color> on an expedition.
• Chocobo Expedition II •

Once they've headed out, you may simply leave the expedition as is. Your units will gain <color=#00ffff>EXP</color> and acquire <color=#00ffff>items</color> based on <color=#00ffff>the amount of time allotted</color> for the expedition.
• Chocobo Expedition III •
Units that are on an expedition are also able to <color=#00ffff>embark on quests</color>, so there is no downside to sending them out on frequent expeditions.
• High-Speed Expeditions •

• High-Speed Expeditions •
When you use an Expedition Ticket, you will instantly acquire EXP and items corresponding to the hours listed on the ticket.
• Collecting Items •
You can collect <color=#00ffff>esper-enhancing materials</color> and other items that can only be acquired via Chocobo Expedition.
• Espers •

• Espers •
Equipping an esper will cause a fixed percentage of its stats to be added to the unit...
• Espers II •
...and the esper's <color=#00ffff>resistances</color> will be <color=#00ffff>added</color> to the unit <color=#00ffff>as is</color>.
• Evocation Magic •

• Evocation Magic •
These are powerful abilities wielded by espers. You can learn how to use them in the Beginner's Hall.
• Enhancement •

• Enhancement •
Enhancing an esper requires specific items. They can mostly be acquired in Chocobo Expedition.
• Esper Training Board •

• Esper Training Board •
You can consume SP acquired after leveling up to unlock panels for various abilities.
• Resetting •

• Resetting •
You can also consume Visiore to reset the Ability Board.
• Resetting II •
The panels will return to <color=#00ffff>a pre-acquired state</color>, and any consumed <color=#00ffff>SP</color> will be <color=#00ffff>recovered</color>.
• Chocobo Expedition •
Proceed to a tutorial on Chocobo Expedition?
Yes
No
